attributes.action: Stop the use of animals in the police force
attributes.additional_details: Humans can run and find safety, but animals can’t. They are forced into dangerous situations and there is nothing they can do.
attributes.background: Animals such as horses and dogs are used in riots and punch ups and they get things thrown at them, shouted at, and it’s scary and not fair. They are injured and get scared and it shouldn’t be aloud as it is very cruel.
